ValidationRule.description: only allow up to 25% Naitonal Account Discount on PPS
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,"System Administrator")) , Payroll_Processing_Services_Package__c || Payroll_Processing_Services_Plus_Package__c , ISPICKVAL( WIN_Check__c , "National Account"), WIN__c > 0.25 ) || AND(NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,"System Administrator")) , Payroll_Processing_Services_Package__c || Payroll_Processing_Services_Plus_Package__c , ISPICKVAL( Discount2_Type__c , "National Account"), Discount2_Percentage__c > 0.25)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: ***National Account discount is only up to 25%* when discounting PPS package***
